SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteCode , AA.BrandCode , AA.GoodsCode , AA.GoodsName , AA.GoodsURL , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice , AA.ImageURL , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name , AA.CategoryName
FROM dbo.TGoodsInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteCode = #SiteCode# AND AA.BrandCode = #BrandCode#
AND ( AA.GoodsCode = #FindText# OR AA.GoodsName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TGoodsInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
